resources.string: Department of Computer and Communication Engineeing

Mobile phones have become very popular and almost 60% of mobile phones are smart phone.
People are relying on the smart phones because of the versatile resources and functions. However there
are some problems while using smart phones including unpredictable battery usage, uncontrollable
network amount, inefficient resource management, insecure system protection and lower performance.
There exists simple system management function built on the smart phone system and many apps with
resource management are available in the app stores. Most systems store the managed data on the local
storage and are not able to maintain long term information, and thus cannot analyze the data to predict
the resource requirement and detect abnormal behaviors. This research develops and designs a smart
phone management system to use the app to periodically collect resource usages and transfer the data to
a remote server which stores the data into the database. The long term information in the database is
processed via statistic methods and combined with cloud services and to provide intergraded services to
users. The resource usages include battery, WiFi/3G, and GPS positions. The gathered information are
presented as time sequences and analyzed by using mathematic statistics. Google map is displayed to
position user’s GPS traces and allow users to query phone’s location records. The contribution of this
research is creating a management platform for smart phone systems to enhance the performance and
security. The infrastructure and long term information are valuable for researchers to work on related
topics and thus improve the development of industry and researches.
Oracle Certified Professional, Java SE 6 Programmer
Research Creativity Award from the National Science Council, Taiwan.
I learn many knowledge about Internet. For example use Linux to make up DNS server and use Apache make up Web server, then I also learn how to communicate with colleague.
I can fix the Internet problem on phone in this company, for example Internet can not work, I will guide the user to set up IP. Then I also detect the device, for example ATUR、router.
You can use this joystick to control the position of the person and blow the buzzer to destroy the stairs.
The Kinect detects action of the player. When the player moves his right or left hand,the enemies lose their blood. The player also can move the body to dodge the enemy attack.
I use Maya 3D to create my ideal home.
Make the image binarization. The white parts in this image automatically turn white and the black parts turn black as well.Red color is adopted to frame the license plate.
Clients can chat in this chatroom. Input the ip and choose one client to chat on the client list,clients also can create nick names before get into the chatroom.
